Posts.Content:
I have micro-calcifications in left breast, (new ones) doctor ordered stat biopsy on 1/31/13. Needless to say I was holding my breath until today, doctor called and said no cancer found!!! thank goodness....I am very glad I had biopsy, at least now I can feel at ease, hope this helped you ladies. So hang tight, probably will be B9 too. 
 Good luck
Posts.Title: Microcalcification cluster

Posts.Content:
Thank you Vita, I am glad that you are ok :). Today I will be busy, (found out about
 my thyroid being abnormal too) going to my general doctor for synthroid medications, I will ask her for xanax or valium. Life is a rollercoaster, one day your up and one day your down....but I am going to try to stay positive. If I do have breast cancer, the survival rate for early stage is over 95%, with many years to live. Grateful to have many supporters in this forum :)
I post results after 2/10.
Posts.Title: Biopsy Anxiety--How to Deal with It?

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response, glad to hear you are well.   I am going to be busy today, so hopefully that will distract me.
Posts.Title: waiting for my Biopsy test, soooo anxious :(

Posts.Content: Just got results today B9!!!, however I have Atypical ductal hyperplasia...prays for all these wonderful women :)
Posts.Title: waiting for my Biopsy test, soooo anxious :(

Posts.Content:
Hello, I am so anxious and sleep deprived. I dont think I can handle any of this :(. 
I had a mammo on 1/25/13, been told I have micrcalcifications on left breast. He ordered a biopsy for 2/6/13. I am crazy with worry
Posts.Title: Biopsy Anxiety--How to Deal with It?

Posts.Content: Hello I just had a mamo on 1/25/13, and was told I have microcalcifications in a cluster.  Doctor does not think it to be cancer, but he is suspicious and that TERRIFIES me. My Biopsy is for 2/6/13. No family history of cancer on my moms side, my dads aunt had it. I scheduled a second opionion on a mammo with another center, before I get biopsy done.  Am I being to overly cautious? , also hoping the second doctor will say something different.
Posts.Title: waiting for my Biopsy test, soooo anxious :(

Posts.Content: My biopsy was moved up to 1/31/13, not the most fun time. They inserted a tatanic clip for future readings. Even though my doctor said he believes 90% B9, I cannot function well until he calls, hopefully by this monday.
Posts.Title: waiting for my Biopsy test, soooo anxious :(

Posts.Content:
That is wonderful news, so happy for you. 
 I had a mammo and they ordered a biopsy on 1/31/13, they saw micro-calcifications in cluster, although dr. said most likely b9. I am a nervous wreck, I wish they would call me soon!!!
Posts.Title: waiting biopsy results today scared
